Diseases included: Normal, Inflammatory processes (pneumonia), Higher density (pleural effusion, atelectatic consolidation, hydrothorax, empyema), Lower density (pneumotorax, pneumomediastinum, pneumoperitoneum), Obstructive pulmonary diseases (emphysema, bronchopneumonia, bronchiectasis, embolism), Degenerative infectious diseases (tuberculosis , sarcoidosis, proteinosis, fibrosis), Encapsulated lesions (abscesses, nodules, cysts, tumor masses, metastases), Mediastinal changes (pericarditis, arteriovenous malformations, lymph node enlargement) and Chest changes (atelectasis, malformations, agenesis, hypoplasia)

Patient age: 0 to 105 years, with a mean of 58.5 and a median of 62
Patient gender: 80,923 images correspond to women and 79,923 to men
